casebody.data:
STATE
v.
COOPER. No. COA06-460. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed March 6, 2007. Certification March 26, 2007. Appeal from the Forsyth (00CRS40391, 00CRS57553, 00CRS57958, 01CRS4207).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed, remanded for correction of clerical error.
